sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 6 meters and a height of 10 meters. Find its area in square meters.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, you can use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 6 meters and the height is 10 meters. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 6 meters × 10 meters = 60 square meters
